about_the_game:
Aya: Tale of Tails is a beautiful third-person exploration game where a life story ends and another one is about to begin.



Once upon a time...

On a cold, yet enchanted winter night, after a recent family loss, a young girl gets read a storybook by her father and enters its ancient, magical world.



You write your own story

Meet and play the role of Aya's new friend - a mystical white wolf and together explore the mysterious faraway lands and their hidden tales. Begin a high-spirited journey, make new friends, save lives and discover your true selves in the mysterious land of tales.

Key Features

  • For fans of adventure story driven games like Journey, Firewatch and Stray.
  • A relatively short game focused on story with some light objectives, puzzle solving and platforming.
  • An emotional soundtrack, with an even more emotional story made by a solo indie developer.
  • Each update will unfold a new chapter with new lands and stories to discover.
  • Supports a fan-translation system for subtitles (see Steam forums for details).

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 CPUs. Intel Core i5 | AMD Ryzen5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 GPUs. (Intel HD not supported)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Aya and her fluffy friend have their paths inevitably cross, as they must find their loved ones and discover their true selves in the mysterious land of tales.
